Text.Page:
Our efforts to stop the Scions of Lok are hampered by their guardians. You are to take the fight to them.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:7#12#Lokian lancers} and {@LinkCreature:7#13#berserkers} in the Cardovek Remnants.

Report to Prefect Nale at the Sanctum Mysterium when your mission is complete.
By the gods, you're a great asset. Where were you when we first deployed? Doesn't matter. You're here now.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
